name: Invoice Ninja
natural_language_description: 这是 Invoice Ninja 节点。主要用于: Consume Invoice Ninja API

apiVersion.name: apiVersion
apiVersion.natural_language_description: 参数名: API Version | 默认值: v5

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: client

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new bank transaction
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a bank transaction
Get (值: get) - Get data of a bank transaction
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get data of many bank transactions
Match Payment (值: matchPayment) - Match payment to a bank transaction

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: bankIntegrationId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
currencyId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

billingAddressUi.name: billingAddressUi
billingAddressUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Billing Address | 默认值: {}

contactsUi.name: contactsUi
contactsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contacts | 默认值: {}

shippingAddressUi.name: shippingAddressUi
shippingAddressUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Shipping Address | 默认值: {}

clientId.name: clientId
clientId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Client ID | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

invoiceItemsUi.name: invoiceItemsUi
invoiceItemsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invoice Items | 默认值: {}

invoiceId.name: invoiceId
invoiceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invoice ID | (必填项)

timeLogsUi.name: timeLogsUi
timeLogsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Time Logs | 默认值: {}

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

invoice.name: invoice
invoice.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
invoice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invoice Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

amount.name: amount
amount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount | 默认值: 0

paymentId.name: paymentId
paymentId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
paymentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Payment Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

expenseId.name: expenseId
expenseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expense ID | (必填项)

quoteId.name: quoteId
quoteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Quote ID | (必填项)

bankTransactionId.name: bankTransactionId
bankTransactionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bank Transaction ID | (必填项)
